"Beach Wars!":
"Summer's here! The beach is here! And big sis Xie is here too! Now is THE season for beach-going on Wopal! Yet, perhaps because of the heat, the Oceanids have gone wild, and Darkers have suddenly appeared, leaving our vacation plans in ruins! We need all ARKS to help take our oasis of relaxation back! So, come on, let's get this beautiful beach back!
――――――――――――――――――――
